useCase.name: Create New User
useCase.description: Create a new user account in the system.

mainSequence.step: Admin starts creating a new user
System requests user data: first name, last name, email, password, password confirmation, mobile number, user type.
Admin provides user data: first name, last name, email, password, password confirmation, mobile number, user type.
System shows data and requests confirmation.
System informs the success of the operation.
